title: Platform Adapter Management
subtitle: Manage bot platform adapters to connect to different chat platforms
emptyText: No platform adapters yet, click Add Adapter to create one

webhookDialog.title: Webhook Callback URL
webhookDialog.description: The callback address is as follows, please ensure that the network environment can be accessed. You can also view the callback address information in the logs.

idConflict.title: ID Conflict Warning
idConflict.message: Detected duplicate ID "{id}". Please use a new ID.

securityWarning.title: Security Warning
securityWarning.aiocqhttpTokenMissing: To enhance connection security, it is strongly recommended to set ws_reverse_token. Not setting a token may lead to security risks.

createDialog.step1Hint: Where do you want to connect the bot? e.g. QQ, WeCom, Feishu, Discord, Telegram.
createDialog.configHint: How do you want to configure the bot? The config file includes model, persona, knowledge base, plugins, and more.
createDialog.configDefaultHint: Uses the default config file "default" by default. You can configure it later.
createDialog.newConfigLoadFailed: Failed to load default config template
createDialog.noRouteRules: No route rules for this platform. The default config file will be used.
createDialog.routeHint: When delivering messages, the first matching config file from top to bottom is used based on session source. Use * to match all. Use /sid to get the session ID. If none match, the default config file is used.

configTableHeaders.configId: Config ID linked to this instance

messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete platform adapter
messages.configNotFoundOpenConfig: Target config file not found. Opened the config page for review.
messages.configIdMissing: Unable to get config file ID.
